entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY ENDED, Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:46 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.0°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Freezing rain or ice pellets early this evening. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
